name: bumi-kartanegara-staff

scripts.dev:standalone: cd frontend && set VITE_USE_MOCK_API=true&& npm run dev
scripts.dev:backend: cd frontend && set VITE_USE_MOCK_API=false&& npm run dev
scripts.build:standalone: cd frontend && set VITE_USE_MOCK_API=true&& npm run build

description: PT. Bumi Kartanegara Staff Management System
